TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Curtis_Armstrong, title = Curtis_Armstrong, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curtis_Armstrong} }

S.FORM: Curtis Armstrong kawas tay 1953, ryax sa tay 27 nqu tay 12, Curtis Armstrong, squliq na Bunge'. hiya ga squilq psibay ru ppqwas maki Amerika.mhtuw msibay "Revenga of the Nerds" ega' na Booger qu lalu nya. ru mhtuw "Moonlighting" TV na Herbert Viola qu lalu nya. "Risky" ega' mhtuw Miles Dalby. qyanux nya Curtis Armstrong hintgan bih Misken,Titli. Norma E.Armstrong hya laqi nya mlikuy. Armstrong tmasuq pqwasan lelaqi mrkyas maki Berkley pqwasan biru. Suruw lga,Curtis Armstrong tmasuq krahu' pqwasan maki Oakland. Trang mrkyas lga snhi tensyukyo,hya ru Elaine Aronson mnagal bes lga,snhi Yutay la. Hya kneril laqi htagan 1996 kawas,Lily Armstrong lalu nya. Curtis Armstrong skahul nya Wanglu miru mha: yaba maku ga kawas 2020,5,25 wal mhuqil nbu na COVID 19 la. pincyogan nya(qnxan) kawas 1983 hiya minqutux mhtuw ega' Risky Business. 2011 kawas 10 byacing 27 ryax,hiya ga mhtuw msibay na "Engagement" TV. kragan nya Nilsson semong mqwas qwas. Armstrong squilq psibay pincyogan nya,hiya smoya Harry Nilsson ppqwas,suruw lga hiya blaq balay rangi la. kawas 2013,Curtis Armstrong mhtuw msibay "New Girl" na sinsiy Foster qu lalu nya,lru hiya ga mhtuw wal mhuqil ten no ckay. Metatron ryax te qeru,mopuw ru mopuw qutux. Babaw nya lga,hiya msibay na Pizza mtbaziy squilq. kawas 1997,Armstrong mhtuw msibay ega' "Meets Nixon" ru mhtuw "Reaper" TV. bincyogan nya
